thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Bio-Rad Q4 Earnings Per Share $2.32

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bio-Rad Q4 Earnings Per Share $2.32
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Bio Rad Laboratories Inc:
* BIO-RAD REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.32 * Q4 SALES ROSE 8.6 PERCENT TO $620.4 MILLION * ‍FOR FULL YEAR 2018, COMPANY ANTICIPATES CURRENCY NEUTRAL REVENUE GROWTH OF APPROXIMATELY 3.5 PERCENT TO 4.0 PERCENT ​
* ‍FOR FULL YEAR 2018, ANTICIPATES IMPROVED PROFITABILITY WITH CURRENCY NEUTRAL OPERATING MARGIN TARGET OF 10 PERCENT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
